name: Challenge #7: Delivery madness
shortDocumentation:
In this challenge your task is to move the single passenger to his desired destination.

Vehicle Class

moveTo(targetCity) Method
- targetCity can be an string with the city ID or an instance of City

victory.text: Deliver the single passenger to his desired destination.
victory.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, util, stats) { return stats.passengersDelivered == 4 }

defeat.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, util, stats) { return stats.elapsedTimeMS > 8; }
